Description: Textile fragment; large oblong fragment of undyed linen cloth; medium quality, edges torn; very worn with large holes, but not darned (warp threads grouping together where rubbed). The weave is plain [warp-faced simple tabby] and the threads are S-spun and S-spliced; the stitch gauge is warp c.31 ends per 10mm and weft c.11 picks per 10mm.
